message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a non-disclosure agreement, I assure you it's worth no less than $800000 to me. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1000000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to gain a strategic advantage. If you're interested, I'd be happy to schedule a call to discuss the details further. Let me know your thoughts!
